1be7434ceccceb79f993d569916a2afcc2527df7.query:
SELECT role_id 
            FROM pinged_roles
            WHERE message_id = $1
            AND server_id = $2

2660cdbf857af75772a0cd0d17f41a57988acc40.query:
SELECT user_id
            FROM pinged_users
            WHERE message_id = $1
            AND server_id = $2

390573789acf850dbd00dbaa2ee2a41aa3b8451f.query:
DELETE FROM message_content
        CASCADE
        WHERE at_time < $1

4ba13acfed20f58ec33a994538421c6472102385.query:
SELECT 
                thanked_users.times,
                (
                    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (
                        SELECT times,server_id
                        FROM thanked_users
                            WHERE times >= (
                                SELECT times
                                FROM thanked_users
                                WHERE server_id = $1
                                AND user_id = $2
                            ) AND server_id = $1
                            GROUP BY times,server_id
                    ) as rankings
                ) AS rank
            FROM thanked_users
            WHERE thanked_users.user_id = $2
            AND thanked_users.server_id = $1
            GROUP BY thanked_users.times

73de726bbb307fc07c80f8927befefb283079a78.query:
INSERT INTO server_config (server_id, time_between_thanking)
        VALUES ($1,$2)
        ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT server_config_pk
        DO
        UPDATE SET time_between_thanking=$2

7cf5fadd0dd7d5b23682f79bfee5b8795edc2895.query: INSERT INTO message_content (author_id,message_id, server_id, at_time, content) VALUES($1,$2,$3,$4,$5)

c1758c21dea0a590ec1aed074ca8db740ac10cac.query:
SELECT user_id, times
        FROM thanked_users
        WHERE user_id != $1
        AND server_id = $2
        ORDER BY times DESC
        LIMIT 10

c3de04dd568a3d6c6e46fbdb10482a99f02b0ae1.query:
SELECT 
            thanked_users.times,
            (
                SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (
                    SELECT times,server_id
                    FROM thanked_users
                        WHERE times >= (
                            SELECT times
                            FROM thanked_users
                            WHERE server_id = $1
                            AND user_id = $2
                        ) AND server_id = $1
                        GROUP BY times,server_id
                ) as rankings
            ) AS rank
        FROM thanked_users
        WHERE thanked_users.user_id = $2
        AND thanked_users.server_id = $1
        GROUP BY thanked_users.times

d2309b37b39e2422a0e3a72374c30899c29d816c.query:
SELECT 
                author_id,
                content,
                count(role_count.role_count) as role_count
            FROM message_content
            INNER JOIN (
                SELECT 
                    COUNT(*) as role_count,
                    message_id,
                    server_id
                FROM pinged_roles
                GROUP BY message_id, server_id
            ) AS role_count
            ON (
                message_content.message_id = role_count.message_id
            AND
                message_content.server_id = role_count.server_id
            )
            WHERE message_content.message_id = $1
            AND message_content.server_id = $2
            GROUP BY author_id,content,role_count.role_count
            LIMIT 1
